modrinthVersion.name: Vanilla Backport Neoforge 1.21.1-1.1.4.3
modrinthVersion.changelog:
- version bump to 1.1.4.3
- added lava chicken music disc (dropped from chicken jockeys)  
- added dennis painting
- players now dismount happy ghasts once underwater
- happy ghasts are now fall damage immune
- ghastlings can now follow happy ghasts
- added AgeableMobRenderer to properly render adult/baby models
- rework happy ghast rider position
- happy ghasts now try to float closer to the floor or nearby structures
- added happy ghast smooth movement
- tweaked happy ghast collisions to not break with lithium/radium
- tweaked leash rendering to not break with pehkui
- tweaked boat leashing to avoid break with small boats
- fixed invalid position visiting check

modrinthProject.title: Macaw's Fences and Walls
modrinthProject.description: Adds new vanilla styled fences, walls and gates!
modrinthProject.body:
![Banner image](https://i.imgur.com/PPlc2JI.png)

[![YouTube](https://img.shields.io/youtube/channel/subscribers/UCc_kqzt253fnG2RHW_CZL2A?label=Youtube&style=for-the-badge)](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCc_kqzt253fnG2RHW_CZL2A)[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/-%20-ffffff)![Twitter](https://img.shields.io/twitter/follow/sketch_macaw?color=6eb7ec&label=Twitter&logo=twitter&style=for-the-badge)![](https://img.shields.io/badge/-%20-ffffff)](https://twitter.com/sketch_macaw)[![Discord](https://img.shields.io/discord/645360921673465857?color=a97db2&logo=discord&logoColor=f&style=for-the-badge)](https://discord.gg/RFQqDEb)[![Crafting Recipes](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Crafting%20Recipes-bc8f56?style=for-the-badge)](https://github.com/sketchmacaw/MacawsModsIssues/wiki)

![](https://i.imgur.com/GUtHhCc.png)

![About](https://i.imgur.com/A1pclRa.png)

We all know Minecraft could use more styled fences, walls and gates. Well I guess I've got good news for you! This mod adds new vanila styled fences, walls and gates.

Expect more stuff to come with future updates, I read every suggestion.

Suggest your ideas on our Macaw's discord.

![](https://i.imgur.com/GUtHhCc.png)

![Latest showcase](https://i.imgur.com/zQ7I8me.png)

Macaw's Fences Video Showcases

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/mqOR-HOaI68" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" allowfullscreen></iframe>

![Promo](https://i.imgur.com/QTUSII3.png)
Do you need a server? Grab 25% off your first month on a BisectHosting Minecraft server using the code **sketchmacaw** and enjoy playing!


![](https://i.imgur.com/GUtHhCc.png)

![FAQ](https://i.imgur.com/EpKoS1L.png)

Q: Do you have any plans on backporting to 1.15.2 and lower?\
A: Very unlikely, but a last 1.12.2 version could happen at some time..

Q: Can I use your mods in my modpack?\
A: Yes, just credit us and with a reference to the modrinth page

Q: I have a translation for you, where can I send it to you?\
A: Either on Github or on our discord server

modrinthVersion.name: Fences and Walls 1.2.0
modrinthVersion.changelog:
Added:
- 14 New Metal Fences, they can stack upwards to be taller
- Curved Double Wooden Gates ( Work like doors, but can be stacked upwards )
- 5 New Double Metal Gates ( Work like doors, but can be stacked upwards )


Changed:
- Added tooltips for the new stackable metal fences / gates
- Added new custom block tags 


Bugs Fixed:
- Fence Gates don't have the item minecraft:fence_gates tag
- Wooden fences don't have the item minecraft:wooden_fences tag
- Wooden fences don't have the block minecraft:wooden_fences tag
- Bamboo Advancement for recipe unlock is missing
- Cherry Fences, Gates have no advancement for recipe unlock 1.20+


Translations:

- ru_ru updated by cutiegin
- es_mx added by TheLegendofSaram
- fr_fr added by Samlegamer
- ko_kr added by kirito5572

modrinthProject.body:
![Banner image](https://i.imgur.com/bS2AfUU.png)

[![YouTube](https://img.shields.io/youtube/channel/subscribers/UCc_kqzt253fnG2RHW_CZL2A?label=Youtube&style=for-the-badge)](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCc_kqzt253fnG2RHW_CZL2A)[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/-%20-ffffff)![Twitter](https://img.shields.io/twitter/follow/sketch_macaw?color=6eb7ec&label=Twitter&logo=twitter&style=for-the-badge)![](https://img.shields.io/badge/-%20-ffffff)](https://twitter.com/sketch_macaw)[![Discord](https://img.shields.io/discord/645360921673465857?color=a97db2&logo=discord&logoColor=f&style=for-the-badge)](https://discord.gg/RFQqDEb)[![Crafting Recipes](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Crafting%20Recipes-bc8f56?style=for-the-badge)](https://github.com/sketchmacaw/MacawsModsIssues/wiki)

![About](https://i.imgur.com/A1pclRa.png)

Do you ever wanted Windows in Minecraft? With parapets/sills, shutter, blinds or curtains?
Well we got you covered, this mod could suit your decorative needs for that!

This Window mod is all about windows, it adds lots of windows which can be opened/closed or locked.
The mod also includes blinds, mosaic glass, mosaic glass panes, one way glass, parapets/sills, gothic windows, shutters, curtains, arrow slits and more..!

Suggest your ideas on our Macaw's discord.

modrinthProject.description: Build roofs with actual roofs instead of stairs!
modrinthProject.body:
![Banner image](https://i.imgur.com/XXkP95c.png)

[![YouTube](https://img.shields.io/youtube/channel/subscribers/UCc_kqzt253fnG2RHW_CZL2A?label=Youtube&style=for-the-badge)](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCc_kqzt253fnG2RHW_CZL2A)[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/-%20-ffffff)![Twitter](https://img.shields.io/twitter/follow/sketch_macaw?color=6eb7ec&label=Twitter&logo=twitter&style=for-the-badge)![](https://img.shields.io/badge/-%20-ffffff)](https://twitter.com/sketch_macaw)[![Discord](https://img.shields.io/discord/645360921673465857?color=a97db2&logo=discord&logoColor=f&style=for-the-badge)](https://discord.gg/RFQqDEb)[![Crafting Recipes](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Crafting%20Recipes-bc8f56?style=for-the-badge)](https://github.com/sketchmacaw/MacawsModsIssues/wiki)



![](https://i.imgur.com/GUtHhCc.png)

![About](https://i.imgur.com/A1pclRa.png)

Do you ever wanted to build a roof with actual roofs instead of stair blocks? Well if yes then you came to the right place!

Macaw's Roofs mod includes many types of new stuff : Roofs, Steep Roofs, Lower Roofs, Awnings, Top Roofs, Rain Gutters and a lot more!

Striped Awnings come in each color, just as Rain Gutters! Rain Gutters are now filling up when it is raining.

Suggest your ideas on our Macaw's discord.

![](https://i.imgur.com/GUtHhCc.png)

![Latest showcase](https://i.imgur.com/zQ7I8me.png)

modrinthVersion.name: Roofs 2.3.2
modrinthVersion.changelog:
Changes:
- New Gutter Texture
- New Rain Gutter Models
- Bottom Rain Gutter can fill up a Cauldron with water if the cauldron is exactly below the Bottom Rain Gutter
- Striped Awning can now be dyed by right clicking with a dye
- Rain Gutters can now also be dyed by right clicking with a dye
- Rain gutters have more realistic water flowing 

Bug Fixes:
- Roofs are not Rain Proof 
- Roofs do not count as sun protection (Vampirism)
- Roofs let light through (Top Roofs still do)
- Cullfacing/Render issue with lower top roofs
- When the block is placed upside-down, the texture is also inverted.
- Roofing tool not working in multiplayer for certain blocks
- Roofing tool is updating neightbouring blocks
- Upside down roofs flip textures on the side, making them look bad

Translations:
- updated ru_ru by cutiegin
- updated es_cl by Ganbare-Lucifer
- added tr_tr by RuyaSavascisi
- added fr_fr by Samlegamer
- added es_mx by TheLegendofSaram
- added ja_jp by Anpan715

Ever wanted to have lots and lots of furniture for your Minecraft houses?

Macaw's Furniture focuses on different styles of furniture and customization. modrinthProject.title: Macaw's Paths and Pavings
modrinthProject.description: Adds vanila styled paths and pavings!
modrinthProject.body:
![Banner image](https://i.imgur.com/emRipp7.png)

[![YouTube](https://img.shields.io/youtube/channel/subscribers/UCc_kqzt253fnG2RHW_CZL2A?label=Youtube&style=for-the-badge)](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCc_kqzt253fnG2RHW_CZL2A)[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/-%20-ffffff)![Twitter](https://img.shields.io/twitter/follow/sketch_macaw?color=6eb7ec&label=Twitter&logo=twitter&style=for-the-badge)![](https://img.shields.io/badge/-%20-ffffff)](https://twitter.com/sketch_macaw)[![Discord](https://img.shields.io/discord/645360921673465857?color=a97db2&logo=discord&logoColor=f&style=for-the-badge)](https://discord.gg/RFQqDEb)[![Crafting Recipes](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Crafting%20Recipes-bc8f56?style=for-the-badge)](https://github.com/sketchmacaw/MacawsModsIssues/wiki)


![](https://i.imgur.com/GUtHhCc.png)

![About](https://i.imgur.com/A1pclRa.png)

This Macaw's mod is another addition to the Macaw's Mod series, the first version adds wooden paths (all wooden variations) and 6 pavings (with 11 texture variations).

This mod is our newest and, we heavily rely on community feedback, suggestions etc..

In the latest 1.0.3 update we added new Running Bond paths, and even slabs/blocks, because they look goof for building too!

Suggest your ideas on our Macaw's discord.

![](https://i.imgur.com/GUtHhCc.png)

![Latest showcase](https://i.imgur.com/zQ7I8me.png)

Macaw's Paths and Pavings Video Showcase

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/gsb-qaMct6c" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" allowfullscreen></iframe>


![Promo](https://i.imgur.com/QTUSII3.png)
Do you need a server? Grab 25% off your first month on a BisectHosting Minecraft server using the code **sketchmacaw** and enjoy playing!



![](https://i.imgur.com/GUtHhCc.png)

![FAQ](https://i.imgur.com/EpKoS1L.png)

Q: Do you have any plans on backporting to 1.15.2 and lower?\
A: Very unlikely, but a last 1.12.2 version could happen at some time..

Q: How do I craft the paths or pavings?\
A: Here are the crafting recipes [Crafting Recipes](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1dBcTfrt-MH91NuCmJzqbFDjrLftuKMc08fp4bjGJCD4/edit#gid=1578096346) 

Q: Can I use your mods in my modpack?\
A: Yes, just credit us and with a reference to the modrinth page

Q: I have a translation for you, where can I send it to you?\
A: Either on Github or on our discord server

![Showcase of several paths](https://i.imgur.com/IfjRY57.jpeg)

modrinthVersion.changelog:
Changes:
- Pickaxes and Shovels now use durability when Engraving or Flattening
- Flattening and Engraving is now compatible with modded Shovels/Pickaxes

Bug Fixes: 
- Engrave doesn't work with modded pickaxes
- Flatten doesn't work with modded shovels
- Paths get removed by water 
- Most Running Bond Paths, Slabs, Blocks are showing wrong color on maps

modrinthProject.title: Macaw's Stairs
modrinthProject.description: Adds new Vanilla styled Stairs, Handrails for Stairs and Balconies!
modrinthProject.body:
![Banner image](https://i.imgur.com/3xicLnO.png)

[![YouTube](https://img.shields.io/youtube/channel/subscribers/UCc_kqzt253fnG2RHW_CZL2A?label=Youtube&style=for-the-badge)](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCc_kqzt253fnG2RHW_CZL2A)[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/-%20-ffffff)![Twitter](https://img.shields.io/twitter/follow/sketch_macaw?color=6eb7ec&label=Twitter&logo=twitter&style=for-the-badge)![](https://img.shields.io/badge/-%20-ffffff)](https://twitter.com/sketch_macaw)[![Discord](https://img.shields.io/discord/645360921673465857?color=a97db2&logo=discord&logoColor=f&style=for-the-badge)](https://discord.gg/RFQqDEb)[![Crafting Recipes](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Crafting%20Recipes-bc8f56?style=for-the-badge)](https://github.com/sketchmacaw/MacawsModsIssues/wiki)



![](https://i.imgur.com/GUtHhCc.png)

![About](https://i.imgur.com/A1pclRa.png)

What if you could improve the existing Vanilla stairs? Or have new ones?!

Well this mod has the answer to that! Now you can add Stair Railings to Vanilla or Modded Stairs, and even change their style

by right clicking with shears! In the mod there are also 5 new stair designs, and balcony railings too!

Remember, this is the very first version of the mod, we optimized the hell out of it! 

Suggest your ideas on our Macaw's discord.

![](https://i.imgur.com/GUtHhCc.png)

![Latest showcase](https://i.imgur.com/zQ7I8me.png)

Macaw's Stairs Showcases

![Latest showcase](https://i.imgur.com/4L4yV6j.gif)

Stair Railings & Balconies can be Toggled with Shears to change their style 

![Latest showcase](https://i.imgur.com/YLU3LmY.gif)

Stair Railings can be placed on both Vanilla and Modded Stairs

![Latest showcase](https://i.imgur.com/EKIN3zr.gif)

Balconies can be placed up to 4 times in the same block


![Promo](https://i.imgur.com/QTUSII3.png)
Do you need a server? Grab 25% off your first month on a BisectHosting Minecraft server using the code **sketchmacaw** and enjoy playing!



![](https://i.imgur.com/GUtHhCc.png)

![FAQ](https://i.imgur.com/EpKoS1L.png)

Q: Do you have any plans on backporting to 1.15.2 and lower?\
A: No. 

Q: Can I use your mods in my modpack?\
A: Yes, just credit us and with a reference to the modrinth page

Q: I have a translation for you, where can I send it to you?\
A: Either on Github or on our discord server

![Showcase of several stairs](https://i.imgur.com/5R1xlGa.jpeg)

modrinthVersion.name: Stairs 1.0.1
modrinthVersion.changelog:
Fixed Issues:
- Skyline Stairs and Bulk Stairs have the same recipe
- Platforms have the same recipe as Furniture Counter (Macaw's Furniture)
- Entities completely ignore stairs and never try to path them
- Balconies have invisible collision, making you able to float in air
- Balcony Railings have a black shade when placed on solid blocks
- Redundant model files removed from block/parent

Lang:
- Added es_cl by Ganbare-Lucifer
- Added fr_fr by Samlegamer
- Added ru_ru by cutiegin

modrinthProject.body:
![Banner image](https://i.imgur.com/MD3qlTu.png)

[![YouTube](https://img.shields.io/youtube/channel/subscribers/UCc_kqzt253fnG2RHW_CZL2A?label=Youtube&style=for-the-badge)](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCc_kqzt253fnG2RHW_CZL2A)[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/-%20-ffffff)![Twitter](https://img.shields.io/twitter/follow/sketch_macaw?color=6eb7ec&label=Twitter&logo=twitter&style=for-the-badge)![](https://img.shields.io/badge/-%20-ffffff)](https://twitter.com/sketch_macaw)[![Discord](https://img.shields.io/discord/645360921673465857?color=a97db2&logo=discord&logoColor=f&style=for-the-badge)](https://discord.gg/RFQqDEb)

![](https://i.imgur.com/GUtHhCc.png)

![About](https://i.imgur.com/A1pclRa.png)

So since so many like our decoration mods, I decided to give paintings a shot. It is a completely new direction where we are heading, so expect a lot of updates for this mod.

The art was made by Peachy. This 1.0.5 version adds 56 paintings, with a vanila fitting style. If you have any suggestions for some painting we could make, let us know!

This mod is compatible with [CyclePaintings](https://modrinth.com/mod/cycle-paintings) from Serillum!

Suggest your ideas on our Macaw's discord.

![](https://i.imgur.com/GUtHhCc.png)

![Banner image](https://i.imgur.com/6BVWu61.png)

[![YouTube](https://img.shields.io/youtube/channel/subscribers/UCc_kqzt253fnG2RHW_CZL2A?label=Youtube&style=for-the-badge)](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCc_kqzt253fnG2RHW_CZL2A)[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/-%20-ffffff)![Twitter](https://img.shields.io/twitter/follow/sketch_macaw?color=6eb7ec&label=Twitter&logo=twitter&style=for-the-badge)![](https://img.shields.io/badge/-%20-ffffff)](https://twitter.com/sketch_macaw)[![Discord](https://img.shields.io/discord/645360921673465857?color=a97db2&logo=discord&logoColor=f&style=for-the-badge)](https://discord.gg/RFQqDEb)[![Crafting Recipes](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Crafting%20Recipes-bc8f56?style=for-the-badge)](https://github.com/sketchmacaw/MacawsModsIssues/wiki)




![](https://i.imgur.com/GUtHhCc.png)

![About](https://i.imgur.com/A1pclRa.png)

Have you ever wanted to have other light sources than the vanilla ones? If that's the case, then you are at the right place!

This very simple mod adds new light sources like: Tiki Torches, Street Lamp Posts, Ceiling Lights,
Lamps, Paper Lamps, Wall Lanterns, New Torches, Light Slabs, Lanterns, Ceiling Fan Lights, Candle Holders, Chandeliers..

Lamps, Street Lights, Tiki Torches, Ceiling Lights can be made as tall as you want! Do you need a 1 block tall lamp or 54 block tall lamp? Your choice.

Everything can be turned off and on, with right click.

Suggest your ideas on our Macaw's discord.

![](https://i.imgur.com/GUtHhCc.png)

![Latest showcase](https://i.imgur.com/zQ7I8me.png)

Macaw's Lights & Lamps Video Showcase

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/CxSGE7RF5MA" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" allowfullscreen></iframe>

![Promo](https://i.imgur.com/QTUSII3.png)
Do you need a server? Grab 25% off your first month on a BisectHosting Minecraft server using the code **sketchmacaw** and enjoy playing!



![](https://i.imgur.com/GUtHhCc.png)

![FAQ](https://i.imgur.com/EpKoS1L.png)

Q: Do you have any plans on backporting to 1.15.2 and lower?\
A: Very unlikely, but a last 1.12.2 version could happen at some time..

Q: Can I use your mods in my modpack?\
A: Yes, just credit us and with a reference to the modrinth page

Q: I have a translation for you, where can I send it to you?\
A: Either on Github or on our discord server

![Showcase of several lights](https://i.imgur.com/bYxsnQ1.png)

modrinthProject.title: Sound Physics Remastered
modrinthProject.description: A Minecraft mod that provides realistic sound attenuation, reverberation, and absorption through blocks.
modrinthProject.body:
# Sound Physics Remastered

> This is a fork of [Sound Physics Fabric](https://github.com/vlad2305m/Sound-Physics-Fabric) by [vlad2305m](https://github.com/vlad2305m) which is a fork of [Sound Physics](https://github.com/sonicether/Sound-Physics) by [Sonic Ether](https://github.com/sonicether).

A Minecraft mod that provides realistic sound attenuation, reverberation, and absorption through blocks.

Optimized for the use with [Simple Voice Chat](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/simple-voice-chat) 2.X.X.


### Requirements
This mod does not require any dependencies, but it is recommended to use the following:

**Fabric**

- [ModMenu](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/modmenu)
- [ClothConfig](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/cloth-config)

**Forge**

- [ClothConfig](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/cloth-config-forge)

---

### Changes to the Original Mod

**Improvements**

- Improved sound processing performance by a factor of 10
- Optimized for [Simple Voice Chat](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/simple-voice-chat)
- Ported the mod to Forge
- Improved configuration UI
- Made Cloth Config optional
- Tweaked default config values
- Added reflectivity to the config GUI
- Added occlusion variation
- Added block occlusion factor config
- Added debug sound bounce rendering
- Added debug sound occlusion rendering

**Bugfixes**

- Fixed sounds not bouncing more than once
- Fixed sound bouncing using an excessive amount of performance, despite not working at all
- Fixed direction evaluation not taking sound source and primary bounces into account
- Fixed sound allowance not working for `/playsound` command
- Fixed unmapped field names in the reflectivity config
- Fixed sound processing using player position instead of camera position

modrinthProject.body:
![](https://i.imgur.com/orqktjl.png)

Particular is a mod that enhances Minecraft's ambience with many hand-crafted visual effects.

Support on [Discord](https://discord.gg/m4EHeRjfZ9) !

## Visual Effects * [3D water splashes](https://youtu.be/vdrn4ouZRvQ?t=27) * Matches the water color * The wider the entity the wider the splash * The taller the fall the taller the splash ![](https://media.forgecdn.net/attachments/description/1219053/description_4678497c-2509-47c8-aa19-264ab655e858.png) * Waterfall cascades * Cascades appear when falling water is over 2 block deep source water and the top source water has at least 1 open side * Cascade strength is proportional to the falling water's height and the number of open sides to the source water ![](https://media.forgecdn.net/attachments/description/1219053/description_37321349-afcb-445f-bf8b-97adc123e676.png) * Fireflies * Spawn in warm biomes at flowers and tall grass * Spawn rates are randomized at dusk ![](https://media.forgecdn.net/attachments/description/1219053/description_79f6f459-600e-4f0d-83ad-6d8dbbffff54.png) * Falling leaves * Each leaves block has a unique leaf particle with varying behavior * Creates ripples when landing on water ![](https://media.forgecdn.net/attachments/description/1219053/description_a900b786-5bcc-46fe-8183-f8776d5da629.png) * Cave dust * Spawn rates are proportional to depth and sunlight level ![](https://media.forgecdn.net/attachments/description/1219053/description_1a888eaa-9012-4c41-8528-330f073c9cdd.png) * Bubbles from underwater chests and barrels * When a chest or barrel is opened underwater it releases bubbles * Ender chests release green-tinted bubbles * Place soul sand under a chest to make it automatically open and release bubbles ![](https://media.forgecdn.net/attachments/description/1219053/description_13325853-dcbc-4489-941b-faca3092a063.png) * Popping bubbles * Ripples from rain and water drips * Cake eating particles * Emissive lava drips ## Configuration The mod can be configured to disable any of the effects and adjust which biomes should not spawn cave dust. ## Supported Mods * [Traverse](https://www.modrinth.com/mod/traverse) * Custom falling leaves * [Regions Unexplored](https://www.modrinth.com/mod/regions-unexplored) * Custom falling leaves * [Wilder Wild](https://www.modrinth.com/mod/wilder-wild) * Custom falling leaves ## Supported Languages * Canadian English (Voxxin) * Canadian French (Voxxin) * Chinese Simplified (KlainsX) * European French (Voxxin) * Mexican Spanish (cerealconjugo) * Russian (Alexander317) ## Disclaimers Port of the [Fabric](https://modrinth.com/mod/particular) version. [Effective](https://modrinth.com/mod/effective) is a similar but unrelated mod that's available for older versions and Built for Quilt™, so send them some love!   If you'd like to support me and the development of my mods, I recommend trying out BisectHosting. Use code "project8gbderam" to get 25% off your first month of a gaming server for new customers. They offer 24/7 support and lightning-fast response times, ensuring you're in great hands and providing exceptional assistance for all your gaming needs. [https://www.bisecthosting.com/project8gbderam](https://www.curseforge.com/linkout?remoteUrl=https://www.bisecthosting.com/project8gbderam) ![Bisect](https://www.bisecthosting.com/partners/custom-banners/54bb107c-f9fc-4f32-8515-fb4e3d56c124.png)
